issues.description: The 'analysis_prompt' in the 'default' analysis variant refers to dimensions as 'POSITIVE SENTIMENT' and 'NEGATIVE SENTIMENT'. These names do not exactly match the dimension names defined in the 'dimensions' section ('positive_sentiment' and 'negative_sentiment').
issues.impact: While the analysis agent may infer the correct mapping in this simple case, this inconsistency violates the v10.0 specification which requires using exact dimension names to ensure reliability. This can lead to ambiguity or potential errors in dimension scoring.
issues.fix: In 'sentiment_binary_v1.md', update the 'analysis_prompt' to use the exact, snake_cased dimension names: 'positive_sentiment' and 'negative_sentiment' when providing scoring instructions.
